name: Cavernus
description: Action, adventure and exploration! Descend into the darkness below and find the treasure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI Graphics Card Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1/ 10 Processor: Intel i5+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher Storage: 1 GB available space
